result.name: Prognostic factors of early response to TKI in chronic myeloid leukemia by whole exome sequencing
result.description: Chronic myeloid leukemia can be well controlled by targeted tyrosine kinase inhibitors (TKI). However there is about 10% of patients with primary resistance or low efficacy of the therapy. In our study we found promissing new potential early prognostic markers and molecular targets for developing new drugs.
result.center: Federal State Budgetary Institution «Research Centre For Medical Genetics», Moscow, Russia
